landing.heroSubtitle: Access important documents, community information, and HOA resources in one secure place.

documents.description: Access all HOA documents, meeting minutes, and legal information in one secure location.

community.description: Stay informed about community events, rules, and important announcements.

notifications.title: Important Notifications

information.title: Multilingual Support
information.description: Access all information in your preferred language with our multilingual support.

landing.aboutSubtitle: A premier beachfront community in Casablanca, Morocco
landing.aboutDescription1: Costa Beach 3 is a premier residential community located in Casablanca, Morocco. Our HOA portal provides owners with easy access to important information and documents.
landing.aboutDescription2: As a homeowner, you'll have access to meeting minutes, financial reports, maintenance schedules, and other important community information through this secure portal.

aboutHistory.title: Our Community History
aboutHistory.paragraph1: Costa Beach 3 was established in 2010 as a premium residential community, designed to provide residents with a luxurious beachfront living experience while maintaining a strong sense of community.
aboutHistory.paragraph2: Over the years, our community has grown and evolved, with continuous improvements to amenities and services to ensure the highest quality of life for our residents.

architecture.title: Modern Architecture
architecture.description: Contemporary design with spacious layouts and premium finishes throughout the property.

beachfront.title: Beachfront Access
beachfront.description: Direct access to a pristine private beach with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean.

modern.title: Modern Architecture
modern.description: Contemporary design with spacious layouts and premium finishes throughout the property.

beach.title: Beachfront Access
beach.description: Direct access to a pristine private beach with stunning views of the Atlantic Ocean.

amenities.title: Premium Amenities
amenities.description: Swimming pools, fitness center, gardens, and recreational areas for all residents.

location.title: Prime Location
location.description: Conveniently located with easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment options.

footer.description: The official homeowners association portal for Costa Beach 3 residential community.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions about Costa Beach 3 HOA? Get in touch with us and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.
